# Portfolio CV Website - Project Setup

## Project Overview
Three.js portfolio website featuring interactive 3D header with rotating letter shapes spelling "CORIN".

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md
- [ ] Scaffold Vite project structure
- [ ] Install Three.js dependencies
- [ ] Create 3D letter header component
- [ ] Implement SVG extrusion system
- [ ] Add 3D model loading capability
- [ ] Create shape variation system
- [ ] Implement responsive layout
- [ ] Test and compile project

## Key Features
- 5+ shape variations per letter (C, O, R, I, N)
- Random shape selection on page reload
- SVG to 3D extrusion support
- Custom 3D model loading (GLTF/GLB)
- Responsive: horizontal on desktop, stacked (CO/RI/N) on mobile
- Rotating 3D animations

## Tech Stack
- Vite (build tool)
- Three.js (3D rendering)
- Vanilla JavaScript
